component.name: Visual Studio Code
component.summary: Visual Studio Code. Code editing. Redefined.

description.p: Visual Studio Code is a new choice of tool that combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for the core edit-build-debug cycle.
This is the proprietary Microsoft build of Visual Studio Code, packaged into a Flatpak. This repackaging is not supported by Microsoft.

screenshot.caption: Editing TypeScript and searching for extensions
